title: Cosi Fan Tutte [Australian Opera]
brief_description: Mozart’s classic comedy is performed at the Victorian Arts Centre, March 28, 1990 as part of the ‘Esso night at the opera’ series. Cast includes Yvonne Kenny, David Hobson, Fiona Janes, Jeffrey Black, Rosamund Illing and John Pringle. In Italian with English sub-titles, music conducted by Peter Robinson.
